mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TALK_INFO ( TALK_SEQ_NO, TITLE, TALK_CONTENTS, REG_DT, CHG_DT, USER_ID )VALUES ( TALK_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{talkContents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT TI.TALK_SEQ_NO as talkSeqNo, TI.TITLE as title, TI.TALK_CONTENTS as talkContents, TI.REG_DT as regDt, TI.CHG_DT as chgDt, TI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM TALK_INFO TI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON TI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID

SELECT TI.TALK_SEQ_NO as talkSeqNo, TI.TITLE as title, TI.TALK_CONTENTS as talkContents, TI.REG_DT as regDt, TI.CHG_DT as chgDt, TI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM TALK_INFO TI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON TI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE TI.TALK_SEQ_NO = #{talkSeqNo}
